name: df-od
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cod, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), csb(s3, crab(s2, cn, wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmg, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), cif(nat0, cinf(cv(s3), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s3), emptycls))))))
comment: Define the order of an element in a group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Sep-2015.) (Revised by AV, 5-Oct-2020.)
